lines.text:
[to the audience]
Does it strike you that my wife is acting a little strangely tonight?
Back to your nest where you belong. You're making a complete fool of yourself.
[He realized that Hazel's legs are tiny]
Hazel, what on Earth happened to your legs?
Oh, ho. What is this? A rather small chicken hawk.
Come on! Come on, you big balooka! Get up and fight! Put up your dukes!
[the rooster gets up and is ready for a fight]
Come on! Come on! Let's start something!
Come back here and fight! What's the matter? Ya chicken!
